Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: X[M] catch(error("setting last-reset! make note of who is!"));
"You feel yourself letting go of all that is you. Something buried deep within you shakes loose and you realize it is your soul. It is all you have now."
"A sensation of indifference permeates your senses abruptly but welcome, as you drift off into unconsciousness."

(\{ 1119243600, "This message will only appear once!\\n\\nThis is the beta of the game Mortalis Victus. It is the first time it goes public, so please be nice. Use @assist to request assistance of any kind. Use @idea, @bug and @typo to file ideas/suggestions, to report bugs, and to point out typos in the gameworld.\\n\\nWhat To Do? You can find and join a faction. Or you can create your own faction, if you feel like leadership material. While this game has some competitive elements, its primary focus is on roleplay and cooperative storytelling. Take that to heart and you'll do great.", 1119646800, "This message will only appear once!\\n\\nThis is the beta of the game Mortalis Victus. It is the first time it goes public, so please be nice. Use @assist to request assistance of any kind. Use @idea, @bug and @typo to file ideas/suggestions, to report bugs, and to point out typos in the gameworld.\\n\\nWhat To Do? You can find and join a faction. Or you can create your own faction, if you feel like leadership material. While this game has some competitive elements, its primary focus is on roleplay and cooperative storytelling. Take that to heart and you'll do great.\\n\\nYou are currently located in the Bright And Glorious Place. Things will not happen until 7 pm EST, but feel free to remain. STAY IN-CHARACTER, THOUGH. I know that might be hard, but if you sincerely need to talk out-of-characterly, be sure to do this using the @OOC command.", 1119654600, "This message will only appear once!\\n\\nThis is the beta of the game Mortalis Victus. It is the first time it goes public, so please be nice. Use @assist to request assistance of any kind. Use @idea, @bug and @typo to file ideas/suggestions, to report bugs, and to point out typos in the gameworld.\\n\\nWhat To Do? You can find and join a faction. Or you can create your own faction, if you feel like leadership material. While this game has some competitive elements, its primary focus is on roleplay and cooperative storytelling. Take that to heart and you'll do great." \})
